full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement
Tender Title (English) W0142-24X012 MHE Rentals
Tender Title (French) W0142-24X012 Location d'équipement de manutention du matériel (EMM)
**Tender Details** * **Serial Number:** WS4383186975-Doc4383193316 * **Amendment:** 2 * **Publication Date:** January 31, 2024 * **Tender Cosing Date:** February 27, 2024 (14:00 EST) **Procurement Details** * **Category:** SRV * **Method of Procurement:** Competitive - Open bidding * **Location:** Canada * **End User:** Department of National Defence (DND) **Service Description** The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites tenders for Material Handling Equipment (MHE) rental services. The proposed services will be used to facilitate the movement of equipment and materiel from permanent buildings to/from vehicles and to drop off points within the base. The Contract award will be on a monthly basis for up to 12 months, with up to three - one (1) year options periods. The contractor must be compliant with all requirements specified in the Mandatory Evaluation Criteria. **Important Notes** * The closing time of the tender has been amended to 14:00 EST on February 27, 2024. Any bids submitted after this time will be declared non-responsive. * The procurement is being undertaken on behalf of the British Army Training Unit (BATUS) at Suffield, AB. **How to Bid** * All bidders must submit a proposal in response to this tender via Ariba Discovery. * The proposal must meet the Mandatory Evaluation Criteria specified in the tender documents. **Contact Information** * Willy Zumbado Diaz (SPAC/PSPC) * Email: [willy.zumbadodiaz@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:willy.zumbadodiaz@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca) * Phone: None **Additional Information** * The tender documents and any other relevant information can be found on the Ariba Discovery website. You should format your output in nice markdown format, remove irrelevant information, and make sure to
